title: SOL 12pk Acrylic Paint Set 8x120ml Versatile Paints + 4 Brushes for Artists - Vibrant Colours for Canvas, Rock, Ceramic, and Wood - Fast-Drying, Water-Based Paint for Adults, Kids, and Hobbyists
features: Create Your Next Masterpiece - Receive 8 large tubes (120ml) with vibrant colours & 4 brushes in our acrylic paints set. Highly versatile perfect as craft paint, art paint, model paint set, canvas paint, clay paint, rock paint, ceramic paint & more.

Very Pigmented & Vibrant - Create art that leaps from your canvas using our mix of Yellow, Red, Blue, Green, Black, White, Orange, and Purple acrylic paint. This acrylic paint set is perfect for hobbyists, professionals & adults.

Add Our Brushes To Your Set - This acrilic painting set features 4 brushes, sizes 2, 8 ,10 & 12. An all in one acrylic paint sets for adults and acrylic paints for artists. Also known as acyrillic paint, paint acrylic, and acrylic paint kit

Highly Versatile - Dilute with water to create a water colour effect or use it straight from the tube for an oil paint effect. Our colours can also be easily mixed and are suitable for paper, canvas, card, board, wood, ceramic, rocks etc
Fast Drying - This acrylic paint set is water based paint, which is fast drying and becomes water resistant when dry. Great for use as paints for canvas painting and paint for garden ornaments.

This product is designed for art use only, it is not suitable for children under 14 years of age. For adult use only. Ensure all surfaces are covered before use. Paint may stain soft furnishings and clothing. Not suitable for finger painting. Keep away from delicate surfaces. In case of spills, it is recommended to wash as soon as possible in hot water to remove the worst of the soiling before being machine washed. Wash hands thoroughly after use.
description: Product Description Previous page Next page Arts and Craft Essentials 12pk Acrylic Paint Set Add To Basket 600pk Googly Eyes Add To Basket 12pk Watercolour Pencils Buying Options SOL 36 Colouring Pencils Add To Basket 18pk Gel Pens for Kids Add To Basket 3pk Modelling Clay Add To Basket Customer Reviews 4.4 out of 5 stars 408 4.5 out of 5 stars 1,086 4.2 out of 5 stars 54 4.3 out of 5 stars 862 4.4 out of 5 stars 277 4.1 out of 5 stars 375 Price £12.99 £ 12 . 99 £4.99 £ 4 . 99 — £5.99 £ 5 . 99 £4.99 £ 4 . 99 £9.99 £ 9 . 99 Vibrant Colours ✔ ✘ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ For All Skills Levels ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Arts and Craft ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Gift Idea ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Fun? ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ What surfaces can I use the SOL acrylic paints on? Our acrylic paints are highly versatile and can be used on canvas, wood, ceramics, rocks, paper, card, and more. They offer excellent adhesion, whether you're creating fine art, decorating garden ornaments, or crafting. How fast do these acrylic paints dry? These paints are water-based and fast-drying, becoming water-resistant once dry. Perfect for quick layering, whether you're working on detailed art or large-scale projects. Can I mix the colours to create new shades? Yes! Our acrylic paints mix easily, giving you endless possibilities to create custom shades. Blend colours directly on your palette for smooth transitions or unique hues for your project. Are these paints suitable for both beginners and professionals? Absolutely! With vibrant colours and high pigment, these paints are ideal for artists of all levels. Whether you're a hobbyist or professional, you'll love the smooth application and versatility of this set. Do I need any special brushes for these paints? No, each set includes 4 brushes of varying sizes, perfect for a range of painting techniques. From detailed work to bold strokes, these brushes complement the rich pigments in the acrylic paints for professional results.
